pr_title: Alter replication number for table in one command

timeline.bodyText:
This should be done in analyze() of ModifyTablePropertyClause.java.
And you can call PropertyAnalyzer.analyzeReplicationNum().
timeline.author: morningman

timeline.message: commit 1:  alter replication number for table in one command
commit 2: only set replication num of unpartitioned table

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Set replication number for a table that only have one partition.
          
          
            
                 * Set replication number for unpartitioned table
timeline.author: morningman
